# Settlement of ETH
This document presents the recommended steps in order to settle the Nahmii 1
balance of NII of account `0x7c0A81f1a217BB51D76AfcdFe33aBb40a75571DF`.

The ordered steps of contract function invocations are included below and in
the corresponding [steps.json](./steps.json). Please read [the general recipe
for settling Nahmii 1 balance](../../README.md) before starting on the first
step of settlement.

## Ordered steps
### Step 1
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementChallengeByPayment* ([0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a](https://etherscan.io/address/0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a))
#### Method name
*startChallengeFromPayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args
* *payment*: 
```
{
  "seals": {
    "wallet": {
      "hash": "0xe4e9ab427ee3f806e5239451de3c57e95ec5cdd5b7be1e756f6374bd7aa4f6e7",
      "signature": {
        "s": "0x630f9b506e32035c58d1a9ec9beb253dd9208d68d113fec16a68effdc95dacf8",
        "r": "0xa866ce6b544e6e3f8c7e97b294331c268d8caa2f0a7a9cb772c2e4a06a4b6a28",
        "v": 28

    "operator": {
      "hash": "0xb9aab25a477f7273007113687c199551a18a25324006daece1a18a1a79d132eb",

### Step 2
#### Contract

*settlePayment*
#### Method payload
```

```

### Step 3
#### Contract

*withdraw*
#### Method payload
```
